How to use it: List people you give to often. Ask AI to calculate reciprocity ratios, emotionally and energetically.
What it changes: Reveals hidden one-sidedness and refines social investment.

What it is: Analyzes how your time use reflects or contradicts your values.
How to use it: Describe your week. Ask AI to compare time spent vs. your stated goals and identity.
What it changes: Highlights misalignments and reclaims narrative control.

What it is: Explores the version of you that could’ve emerged if fear wasn’t present.
How to use it: Describe what you almost became. Ask AI to model how that version of you would think and act now.
What it changes: Reconciles regret with imagination and agency.

What it is: Helps disentangle identity from toxic relational fusion.
How to use it: Describe a person you lose yourself around. Ask AI to generate a system of separation without rupture.

What it is: Prescribes forms of nourishment based on emotional hunger types.
How to use it: Describe your persistent longing. Ask AI to list activities, art, or experiences to symbolically feed it.
What it changes: Turns emotional void into a creative sourcing ritual.

What it is: Unmasks your inner critic’s voice as a symbolic character.
How to use it: Write your inner critic’s recent words. Ask AI to decode which archetype or past authority they represent.
What it changes: Separates self from shame by externalizing judgment.

What it is: Models the gravitational center of your daily attention patterns.
How to use it: Describe what grabs your attention most often. Ask AI to locate the hidden need beneath the fixation.
What it changes: Reorients distraction into intentional attention strategy.

What it is: Changes your emotional interpretation by shifting observer position.
How to use it: Describe a recent emotional experience. Ask AI to describe it as if observed by your future self, a stranger, and an enemy.
What it changes: Defuses intensity and reveals multiple truths simultaneously.

What it is: Simulates the probable emotional echo of a decision over time.
How to use it: Name a choice. Ask AI to model its echo at 1 week, 1 month, and 1 year emotionally, relationally, and symbolically.
What it changes: Improves foresight and deep-time decision logic.

What it is: Replaces emotionally draining actions with high-yield emotional analogs.
How to use it: List activities that drain you. Ask AI for replacements that serve the same function with emotional profit.
What it changes: Increases emotional ROI and reduces burnout.
